mod.name: Ferrothorn
mod.description: A fan mod inspired by the Pokemon Ferrothorn.

cards.name: Insomnia
cards.description:
Draw 1 card.
Gain 1 Block.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Insomnia+
cards.description:
Draw 2 cards.
Gain 2 Block.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Seed
cards.description:
Deal 3 damage.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Seed+
cards.description:
Deal 5 damage.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Solar Beam Attack
cards.description:
Deal 29 damage.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Solar Beam Attack+
cards.description:
Deal 36 damage.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Defend
cards.description: Gain 6 Block.

cards.name: Defend+
cards.description: Gain 9 Block.

cards.name: Growth
cards.description:
ferrothorn:Grow twice.
If you are not in a ferrothorn:Weather, enter a random one.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Growth+
cards.description:
ferrothorn:Grow three times.
If you are not in a ferrothorn:Weather, choose one to enter.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Leech Seed
cards.description:
Apply 2 ferrothorn:Leech_Seed.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Leech Seed+
cards.description:
Apply 3 ferrothorn:Leech_Seed.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Strike
cards.description: Deal 5 damage.

cards.name: Strike+
cards.description: Deal 8 damage.

cards.name: Aerial Ace
cards.description:
Deal 6 damage.
You can always play this card.
This card always deals 6 damage.

cards.name: Aerial Ace+
cards.description:
Deal 9 damage.
You can always play this card.
This card always deals 9 damage.

cards.name: Assist
cards.description:
Gain 8 Block.
Place a card from your discard pile on top of your draw pile.

cards.name: Assist+
cards.description:
Gain 11 Block.
Place a card from your discard pile on top of your draw pile.

cards.name: Bullet Seed
cards.description: Randomly add 2 to 5 Seeds into your hand.

cards.name: Bullet Seed+
cards.description: Randomly add 4 to 5 Seeds into your hand.

cards.name: Confide
cards.description: Gain 4 ferrothorn:Stamina.

cards.name: Confide+
cards.description: Gain 6 ferrothorn:Stamina.

cards.name: Grass Knot
cards.description:
Deal 6 damage to ALL enemies.
Repeats for each enemy with more HP than you.

cards.name: Grass Knot+
cards.description:
Deal 9 damage to ALL enemies.
Repeats for each enemy with more HP than you.

cards.name: Head Charge
cards.description:
Deal 9 damage.
The enemy immediately attacks you for 3 damage.

cards.name: Head Charge+
cards.description:
Deal 12 damage.
The enemy immediately attacks you for 2 damage.

cards.name: Iron Head
cards.description:
Deal 6 damage.
Apply 1 Weak.

cards.name: Iron Head+
cards.description:
Deal 7 damage.
Apply 2 Weak.

cards.name: Power Whip
cards.description: Deal 16 damage.

cards.name: Power Whip+
cards.description: Deal 21 damage.

cards.name: Rain Dance
cards.description:
ferrothorn:Grow.
Enter ferrothorn:Rain.

cards.name: Rain Dance+
cards.description:
ferrothorn:Grow.
Enter ferrothorn:Rain.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Revenge
cards.description:
Deal 7 damage.
If the enemy intends to attack, deal 7 damage again.

cards.name: Revenge+
cards.description:
Deal 9 damage.
If the enemy intends to attack, deal 9 damage again.

cards.name: Sandstorm
cards.description:
ferrothorn:Grow.
Enter ferrothorn:Sandstorm.

cards.name: Sandstorm+
cards.description:
ferrothorn:Grow.
Enter ferrothorn:Sandstorm.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Shift Gear
cards.description:
Gain 10 Block.
Dexterity affects this card twice.

cards.name: Shift Gear+
cards.description:
Gain 12 Block.
Dexterity affects this card three times.

cards.name: Spikes
cards.description:
Gain 2 Thorns.
Exhaustive 3.

cards.name: Spikes+
cards.description:
Gain 3 Thorns.
Exhaustive 3.

cards.name: Stealth Rock
cards.description:
Gain 3 ferrothorn:Scales.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Stealth Rock+
cards.description:
Gain 5 ferrothorn:Scales.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Sucker Punch
cards.description:
Deal 8 damage.
If the enemy intends to attack, gain 8 Block instead.

cards.name: Sucker Punch+
cards.description:
Deal 11 damage.
If the enemy intends to attack, gain 11 Block instead.

cards.name: Sunny Day
cards.description:
ferrothorn:Grow.
Enter ferrothorn:Harsh_Sunlight.

cards.name: Sunny Day+
cards.description:
ferrothorn:Grow.
Enter ferrothorn:Harsh_Sunlight.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Synthesis
cards.description:
Gain 7 Block.
ferrothorn:Grow.

cards.name: Synthesis+
cards.description:
Gain 10 Block.
ferrothorn:Grow.

cards.name: Teeter Dance
cards.description: Gain 7 Block for each enemy in combat.

cards.name: Teeter Dance+
cards.description: Gain 10 Block for each enemy in combat.

cards.name: Toxic Spikes
cards.description:
Gain 1 ferrothorn:Toxic_Spikes.
Draw 1 card.
Exhaustive 2.

cards.name: Toxic Spikes+
cards.description:
Gain 2 ferrothorn:Toxic_Spikes.
Draw 1 card.
Exhaustive 2.

cards.name: Weather Ball
cards.description:
Deal 6 damage.
Effect varies with ferrothorn:Weather.

cards.name: Weather Ball+
cards.description:
Deal 9 damage.
Effect varies with ferrothorn:Weather.

cards.name: Acid Spray
cards.description:
Deal 4 damage to ALL enemies.
Gain ferrothorn:Stamina equal to unblocked damage dealt.

cards.name: Acid Spray+
cards.description:
Deal 6 damage to ALL enemies.
Gain ferrothorn:Stamina equal to unblocked damage dealt.

cards.name: After You
cards.description:
Gain 11 Block.
Put a card from your hand on top of your draw pile.
It costs 0 until played.

cards.name: After You+
cards.description:
Gain 15 Block.
Put a card from your hand on top of your draw pile.
It costs 0 until played.

cards.name: Ancient Power
cards.description:
Gain 1 Dexterity.
Gain 1 Metallicize.
Gain 1 Plated Armor.

cards.name: Ancient Power+
cards.description:
Gain 1 Dexterity.
Gain 1 Metallicize.
Gain 1 Plated Armor.

cards.name: Baneful Bunker
cards.description:
Gain 12 Block.
 Gain 1 ferrothorn:Toxic_Spikes.

cards.name: Baneful Bunker+
cards.description:
Gain 14 Block.
 Gain 2 ferrothorn:Toxic_Spikes.

cards.name: Body Press
cards.description:
Deal 9 damage.
Affected by Block modifiers instead of damage modifiers.

cards.name: Body Press+
cards.description:
Deal 12 damage.
Affected by Block modifiers instead of damage modifiers.

cards.name: Cotton Guard
cards.description: Gain 3 Block 3 times.

cards.name: Cotton Guard+
cards.description: Gain 3 Block 4 times.

cards.name: Curse
cards.description:
Gain 1 Strength.
Gain 1 Dexterity.
Shuffle a Wound into your draw pile.

cards.name: Curse+
cards.description:
Gain 1 Strength.
Gain 1 Dexterity.
Shuffle a Slimed into your discard pile.

cards.name: Defense Curl
cards.description:
Gain 2 Metallicize.
At the end of combat, heal 2 HP.

cards.name: Defense Curl+
cards.description:
Gain 3 Metallicize.
At the end of combat, heal 3 HP.

cards.name: Diamond Storm
cards.description:
Deal 6 damage.
Gain 6 Block twice.

cards.name: Diamond Storm+
cards.description:
Deal 8 damage.
Gain 8 Block twice.

cards.name: Double Team
cards.description:
Gain 5 Block.
Next turn gain 5 Block.

cards.name: Double Team+
cards.description:
Gain 7 Block.
Next turn gain 7 Block.

cards.name: Endure
cards.description:
The first time you lose HP, gain 10 Block
 and 1 Blur.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Endure+
cards.description:
The first time you lose HP, gain 15 Block
 and 1 Blur.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Explosion
cards.description:
Lose 4 HP.
Deal 28 damage.

cards.name: Explosion+
cards.description:
Lose 4 HP.
Deal 36 damage.

cards.name: Fell Stinger
cards.description:
Deal 12 damage.
If this kills an enemy, add a copy of this to your hand.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Fell Stinger+
cards.description:
Deal 12 damage.
If this kills an enemy, add a copy of this to your hand.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Flatter
cards.description:
Gain 14 Block.
Give 1 Strength to the enemy.

cards.name: Flatter+
cards.description:
Gain 19 Block.
Give 1 Strength to the enemy.

cards.name: Follow Me
cards.description:
Gain 10 Block.
ALL enemies immediately attack you for 4 damage.

cards.name: Follow Me+
cards.description:
Gain 10 Block.
ALL enemies immediately attack you for 2 damage.

cards.name: Foul Play
cards.description:
Deal 9 damage.
Damage is calculated with the enemy's powers, instead of yours.

cards.name: Foul Play+
cards.description:
Deal 12 damage.
Damage is calculated with the enemy's powers, instead of yours.

cards.name: Harden
cards.description:
Gain 1 Dexterity
and 2 ferrothorn:Scales.

cards.name: Harden+
cards.description:
Gain 1 Dexterity
and 4 ferrothorn:Scales.

cards.name: Hyper Beam
cards.description:
Deal 25 damage.
Next turn, lose [E] .

cards.name: Hyper Beam+
cards.description:
Deal 32 damage.
Next turn, lose [E] .

cards.name: Ingrain
cards.description:
Innate.
Heal 4 HP.
ferrothorn:Grow.  
Exhaust.

cards.name: Ingrain+
cards.description:
Innate.
Heal 6 HP.
ferrothorn:Grow.  
Exhaust.

cards.name: Iron Defense
cards.description: Gain 2 Dexterity.

cards.name: Iron Defense+
cards.description: Gain 3 Dexterity.

cards.name: Payback
cards.description:
Deal 8 damage.
If this is in your hand at the end of your turn, increase its damage by 6 this combat.

cards.name: Payback+
cards.description:
Deal 10 damage.
If this is in your hand at the end of your turn, increase its damage by 10 this combat.

cards.name: Quick Guard
cards.description:
Gain 10 Block.
Draw a card for each enemy that intends to attack you.

cards.name: Quick Guard+
cards.description:
Gain 13 Block.
Draw a card for each enemy that intends to attack you.

cards.name: Rock Polish
cards.description:
Draw 2 cards.
Remove Frail.

cards.name: Rock Polish+
cards.description:
Draw 3 cards.
Remove Frail.

cards.name: Seed Bomb
cards.description: Add a Seed+ to your hand and double its damage.

cards.name: Seed Bomb+
cards.description:
Add a Seed+ to your hand.
Double the damage
of ALL Seed cards in your hand.

cards.name: Seed Flare
cards.description:
Deal 10 damage.
Apply 2 Vulnerable.
Apply extra Vulnerable for each other Seed card in your hand.

cards.name: Seed Flare+
cards.description:
Deal 12 damage.
Apply 3 Vulnerable.
Apply extra Vulnerable for each other Seed card in your hand.

cards.name: Shell Trap
cards.description:
Gain 6 Block.
Whenever you are attacked this turn, deal 3 damage to the attacker.

cards.name: Shell Trap+
cards.description:
Gain 8 Block.
Whenever you are attacked this turn, deal 4 damage to the attacker.

cards.name: Shore Up
cards.description:
Gain 4 Plated Armor.
In ferrothorn:Sandstorm gain additional Plated Armor equal to your Dexterity.

cards.name: Shore Up+
cards.description:
Gain 4 Plated Armor.
In ferrothorn:Sandstorm gain as much Dexterity instead.

cards.name: Snap Trap
cards.description:
Gain 9 Block.
Draw 2 cards.
Apply 2 ferrothorn:Leech_Seed.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Snap Trap+
cards.description:
Gain 10 Block.
Draw 3 cards.
Apply 3 ferrothorn:Leech_Seed.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Solar Beam
cards.description:
Shuffle a Solar Beam Attack into your draw pile.
In ferrothorn:Harsh_Sunlight add it to your hand instead.

cards.name: Solar Beam+
cards.description:
Shuffle a Solar Beam Attack+ into your draw pile.
In ferrothorn:Harsh_Sunlight add it to your hand instead.

cards.name: Spiky Shield
cards.description:
Gain 8 Block.
Gain 1 Thorns.

cards.name: Spiky Shield+
cards.description:
Gain 9 Block.
Gain 2 Thorns.

cards.name: Strength Sap
cards.description:
Heal HP equal to enemy's Strength.
Enemy loses 2 Strength.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Strength Sap+
cards.description:
Heal HP equal to enemy's Strength.
Enemy loses 3 Strength.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Substitute
cards.description:
Lose 7 HP.
Prevent the next time you would lose HP.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Substitute+
cards.description:
Lose 4 HP.
Prevent the next time you would lose HP.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Swagger
cards.description:
Apply 3 Strength to the enemy.
Stun.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Swagger+
cards.description:
Apply 3 Strength to the enemy.
Stun.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Swallow
cards.description: Gain 8 Block X times.

cards.name: Swallow+
cards.description: Gain 10 Block X times.

cards.name: Taunt
cards.description: The enemy instantly attacks you for 2 damage twice.

cards.name: Taunt+
cards.description: The enemy instantly attacks you for 1 damage three times.

cards.name: Thunder
cards.description:
Remove all Block from an enemy.
Deal 14 damage.
In ferrothorn:Rain this costs 0.

cards.name: Thunder+
cards.description:
Remove all Block from an enemy.
Deal 18 damage.
In ferrothorn:Rain this costs 0.

cards.name: Toxic
cards.description:
Apply 4 Poison.
Increase this card's Poison by 3 this combat.

cards.name: Toxic+
cards.description:
Apply 5 Poison.
Increase this card's Poison by 4 this combat.

cards.name: Venom Drench
cards.description:
Gain 8 Block.
If an enemy has Poison,
gain 3 ferrothorn:Stamina.

cards.name: Venom Drench+
cards.description:
Gain 10 Block.
If an enemy has Poison,
gain 5 ferrothorn:Stamina.

cards.name: Wish
cards.description: Next turn gain Block equal to half your current Block.

cards.name: Wish+
cards.description: Next turn gain Block equal to half your current Block.

cards.name: Worry Seed
cards.description:
Add 2 Seeds into your hand.
Then transform ALL Seed cards in your hand into Insomnia.

cards.name: Worry Seed+
cards.description:
Add 3 Seeds into your hand.
Then transform ALL Seed cards in your hand into Insomnia.

cards.name: Autotomize
cards.description:
Draw 2 cards.
Affected by Block modifiers.

cards.name: Autotomize+
cards.description:
Draw 4 cards.
Affected by Block modifiers.

cards.name: Counter
cards.description: Whenever you fully block an enemy's attack, deal that much damage back to the attacker.

cards.name: Counter+
cards.description: Whenever you fully block an enemy's attack, deal that much damage back to the attacker.

cards.name: Defog
cards.description:
Exit your ferrothorn:Weather.
Remove Strength on EVERYONE.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Defog+
cards.description:
Remove Artifact and Strength on ALL enemies.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Encore
cards.description:
Repeat the effects of the last card you played.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Encore+
cards.description: Repeat the effects of the last card you played.

cards.name: Grassy Terrain
cards.description: Apply 4 Regen to EVERYONE.

cards.name: Grassy Terrain+
cards.description: Apply 5 Regen to EVERYONE.

cards.name: Gyro Ball
cards.description:
Deal 13 damage.
Deals 1 additional damage for each Relic you have.

cards.name: Gyro Ball+
cards.description:
Deal 13 damage.
Deals 2 additional damage for each Relic you have.

cards.name: Heavy Slam
cards.description:
Deal 11 damage.
Deals additional damage equal to your Max HP exceeding 80. If Fatal, gain 1 Max HP.

cards.name: Heavy Slam+
cards.description:
Deal 11 damage.
Deals additional damage equal to your Max HP exceeding 80. If Fatal, gain 2 Max HP.

cards.name: Helping Hand
cards.description:
Your next Attack deals double damage.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Helping Hand+
cards.description: Your next Attack deals double damage.

cards.name: King's Shield
cards.description:
Gain 8 Block.
Whenever you are attacked this turn, apply 2 Weak back.

cards.name: King's Shield+
cards.description:
Gain 10 Block.
Whenever you are attacked this turn, apply 3 Weak back.

cards.name: Magnet Rise
cards.description:
Gain [E] for each enemy in combat.
Draw 1 card.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Magnet Rise+
cards.description:
Gain [E] .
Gain [E] for each enemy in combat.
Draw 1 card.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Metal Burst
cards.description: Whenever you gain Block, deal 2 damage to a random enemy.

cards.name: Metal Burst+
cards.description: Whenever you gain Block, deal 3 damage to a random enemy.

cards.name: Moonlight
cards.description:
Choose a ferrothorn:Weather to enter. Activate exiting effects of the other two.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Moonlight+
cards.description:
Innate.
Choose a ferrothorn:Weather to enter. Activate exiting effects of the other two.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Morning Sun
cards.description:
Gain Hazards varying with ferrothorn:Weather.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Morning Sun+
cards.description: Gain Hazards varying with ferrothorn:Weather.

cards.name: Protect
cards.description:
Gain 1 Intangible.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Protect+
cards.description:
Gain 1 Intangible.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Rage Powder
cards.description:
If the enemy intends to attack, gain 25 Block.
The enemy performs its attack on you and himself.

cards.name: Rage Powder+
cards.description:
If the enemy intends to attack, gain 28 Block.
The enemy performs its attack on EVERYONE.

cards.name: Rollout
cards.description:
Deal 8 damage.
Increase this card's damage by 6 this combat. Add a copy of this card to your discard pile.

cards.name: Rollout+
cards.description:
Deal 8 damage.
Increase this card's damage by 9 this combat. Add a copy of this card to your discard pile.

cards.name: Sappy Seed
cards.description:
Deal 7 damage.
Apply 2 ferrothorn:Leech_Seed.

cards.name: Sappy Seed+
cards.description:
Deal 8 damage.
Apply 3 ferrothorn:Leech_Seed.

cards.name: Spotlight
cards.description: At the start of your turn, a random enemy instantly attacks you for 0 damage.

cards.name: Spotlight+
cards.description: At the start of your turn, a random enemy instantly attacks you for 0 damage.

cards.name: Sticky Web
cards.description: Whenever you are attacked, draw 1 card.

cards.name: Sticky Web+
cards.description:
Innate.
Whenever you are attacked, draw 1 card.

cards.name: Wide Guard
cards.description:
Gain 11 Block.
Gain 1 Blur.

cards.name: Wide Guard+
cards.description:
Gain 11 Block.
Gain 2 Blur.

relics.name: Iron Barbs
relics.flavorText: Its spikes are harder than steel.

relics.name: Dry Skin
relics.description:
While in ferrothorn:Rain, gain 4 Block at the end of your turn.
If you are in another Weather, lose 2 Block instead.

relics.name: Sand Veil
relics.description: While in ferrothorn:Sandstorm lose 2 Strength but you apply 1 Weak to ALL enemies at the start of your turn.

relics.name: Solar Power
relics.description: While in ferrothorn:Harsh_Sunlight your Attacks deal 4 additional damage, but while in Harsh Sunlight you also lose 1 HP at the end of your turn

relics.name: Drizzle
relics.description: Weather spawns on every Non-Boss combat.

relics.name: Moxie
relics.description: When you deal 14 unblocked damage, draw 1 card.

relics.name: Defeatist
relics.description: If your HP is above 50%, gain [E] at the start of your turn.

relics.name: Rocky Helmet
relics.description:
Replaces Iron Barbs.
Start each combat with 4 Scales and 4 Thorns.
relics.flavorText: The attacker will also be damaged upon contact.

relics.name: Rare Candy
relics.description: Upon pickup, raise your Max HP by 6 and chose 1 card to add to your deck.

keywords.name: Ferrothorn:grow
keywords.description: Activate exiting effects of your current Weather without exiting it.

keywords.name: Harsh Sunlight
keywords.description:
Draw a card at the start of your turn.
Upon exiting this Weather, gain [E] .

keywords.name: Leech Seed
keywords.description:
The enemy loses HP at the end of each turn.
When the enemy dies, heal HP.

keywords.name: Ferrothorn:rain
keywords.description:
Reduce received Attack damage by 20%.
Upon exiting this Weather, add a Seed+ to your hand.

keywords.name: Ferrothorn:sandstorm
keywords.description:
At the end of your turn, deal 4 damage to ALL enemies.
Upon exiting this Weather, gain 1 Metallicize.

keywords.name: Ferrothorn:scale
keywords.description: Once an enemy's finished attacking, deals damage back.

keywords.name: Ferrothorn:stamina
keywords.description: Your next card that grants you Block grants you additional Block.

keywords.name: Toxic Spikes
keywords.description: Whenever you are attacked, apply Poison back.

keywords.name: Ferrothorn:weather
keywords.description: You can only have one Weather at a time.
